alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:51PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fond du Lac County through 315 PM CDT... At 251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oakfield, or 7 miles southwest of Fond Du Lac. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakfield, Byron, Oak Center, and Lagoda. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 150 and 156. Interstate 41 between mile markers 90 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
